titles: Reasons offered to the consideration of His Grace, His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Hononrable [sic] Estates of Parliament, by several salt-masters, against the Act for a manufactorie of salt npon [sic] salt, given in by Mr. William Areskin Governour of Blackness Castle.
author: Erskine, William, d. 1700.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Salt industry and trade --  Law and legislation --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
